import React, {useState} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; function Account(props) { const [form, setForm] = useState({}) const handleOk = e => { e.preventDefault() axios.post('http://10.110.160.50:8008/api/users/register', {...form, roleId: 2, isActive: true}). then(res => props.history.push('/dashboard')). catch(err => err) } const onChange = e => { const {name, value} = e.target; setForm(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })) } return (
